title: Median age of the population in Saudi Arabia 2015
summary: Overall Age median in years has increased over the Year.
Age median in years is roughly constant from 1950 to 1995, and lastly slightly increasing from 1995 to 2035.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2015.
Maximum Age median in years, about 36.3 was reported at Year 2035
The lowest Age median in years, of value 18.0 was reported at Year 1970, and 1975
